about_the_game:
In the legends of King Arthur, meet Sir Launcelot the Brave! Sir Sagramore the Just! And Sir... Bob... who I'm sure has a great personality!

Take the role of the eager but clumsy squire Bob; as nobles, soldiers, and the Lady of the Lake all say you're too wimpy to become a Knight. Can you prove them wrong?

This lighthearted adventure game features well-known and lesser-known characters from Arthurian legend, taking inspiration from the famous classics and offering fun for all ages. Any similarity to any person actually named Bob, or for that matter Launcelot, is purely coincidental.

Features
  • Based on the classic stories from legend!
  • Point-and-click advenure gaming in the style of the Sierra and LucasArts classics.
  • Decision driven gameplay; make NPCs love or hate you based on your actions.
  • Inventory system lets you throw items around anywhere.
  • Retro hand-drawn artwork.
  • Voice acting.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.0 or compatible
  • Processor: Intel or AMD CPU
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: SDL compatible graphics card
  • Sound Card: SDL compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Compatible with CentOS 7.2, Debian 8.6, Mint 17, OpenSuSE 12.2
